page.title: 04CARDROSS _ HOUSING
page.content: {COUNCIL HOUSING}IS TO BE FOUND AT THE WEST END OF THE VILLAGE NORTH OF THE MAIN ROAD. THERE IS A VARIETY OF SIZE AND STYLE OF HOUSE. THERE ARE BLOCKS OF 4 FLATS, TERRACED AND SEMI- DETATCHED HOUSES AS WELL AS 4 OLD PEOPLES BUNGALOWS. THE LAW NOW ALLOWS TENANTS TO BUY THEIR HOUSES AND A FEW HAVE DONE SO. {PRIVATE HOUSING}IN THIS BLOCK MUSH- ROOMED DURING THE LAST 15-20 YEARS. IT ACCOUNTS FOR TWO THIRDS OF HOMES IN THE SECTOR. THESE HOUSES WERE BUILT BY THE VILLAGE FIRM JAS.G.RITCHIE & SON. WITH COMPLETION OF THE KILMAHEW DEVELOPMENT, BUILDING HAS COME TO A STANDSTILL APART FROM ON GAP-SITES. {RENTS AND RATES-}RATES ARE PAYABLE BY ALL HOUSEHOLDERS TO STRATHCLYDE REGION. COUNCIL TENANTS ALSO PAY RENT TO THE DISTRICT COUNCIL.
